plot: The story of the Lost Mine is a pretty one, telling how a poor prospector was grub-staked by a tender-hearted girl, and after perilous adventures found a mine and won a bride.
title: The Lost Mine
plot_es: The story of the Lost Mine is a pretty one, telling how a poor prospector was grub-staked by a tender-hearted girl, and after perilous adventures found a mine and won a bride.
plot_en: The story of the Lost Mine is a pretty one, telling how a poor prospector was grub-staked by a tender-hearted girl, and after perilous adventures found a mine and won a bride.
